name: Jayant Sogani
description: As a passionate Software Developer with over [X years] of experience, I specialize in creating robust and scalable web applications. My expertise lies in modern technologies such as JavaScript, React, and Node.js, which I utilize to build user-friendly interfaces and efficient back-end services. I am committed to writing clean, maintainable code and am proficient in agile development methodologies, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality software solutions. My problem-solving skills enable me to troubleshoot and optimize applications effectively, while my strong collaboration abilities allow me to work seamlessly with cross-functional teams. Continuously learning and adapting to new technologies is integral to my work ethic, ensuring I stay at the forefront of industry trends.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
